p: Various CNS active Indian herbal medicines like Withania somnifera, Centella asiatica, Celastrus paniculatus and Bacopa monnieri have shown cognitive improvement in experimental models of AD when given as prophylactic treatment [ 43, 44, 45, 46, 47, 48]. A randomized, double-blind exploratory trial reported comparable efficacy of a Gingko biloba extract and donepezil in AD patients with associated neuropsychiatric problems. The combination was reported to be superior to donepezil monotherapy in terms of both safety and efficacy [ 49].
